com.amazon.ags.api.achievements
Interface AchievementsClient

public interface AchievementsClient

The Amazon Games AchievementsClient Service client object Get this object from AmazonGames to access all AchievementsClient Service operations

Method Summary
 AGResponseHandle<GetAchievementResponse> getAchievement(java.lang.String achievementId, java.lang.Object... userData)
          Returns the specified achievement object.
 AGResponseHandle<GetAchievementsResponse> getAchievements(java.lang.Object... userData)
          Returns a list of Achievement objects to the returned handle.
 AGResponseHandle<RequestResponse> showAchievementsOverlay(java.lang.Object... userData)
          Show the AmazonGames achievements overlay.

          Updates progress toward the specified achievement by the specified amount.
 

Method Detail

getAchievements

AGResponseHandle<GetAchievementsResponse> getAchievements(java.lang.Object... userData)
Returns a list of Achievement objects to the returned handle. The list returned in the response includes all visible achievements for the game. Visible achievements include those that were never hidden, and those that were once hidden but since made visible. Each Achievement object in the list includes the current players progress toward the Achievement.

Parameters:
userData - User provided data for the call.
Returns:
Returns a handle to poll for completion.

getAchievement

AGResponseHandle<GetAchievementResponse> getAchievement(java.lang.String achievementId,
                                                        java.lang.Object... userData)
Returns the specified achievement object.

Parameters:
achievementId - Achievement ID to get.
userData - User data for the call.
Returns:
Returns a handle to poll for completion.

updateProgress

AGResponseHandle<UpdateProgressResponse> updateProgress(java.lang.String achievementId,
                                                        float percentComplete,
                                                        java.lang.Object... userData)
Updates progress toward the specified achievement by the specified amount. Result is returned through the returned handle. The response is a generic RequestResponse If a value outside of range is submitted, it is capped at 100 or 0. If submitted value is less than the stored value, the update is ignored.

Parameters:
achievementId -
percentComplete, - a float between 0.0f and 100.0f
userData - User data for the call.
Returns:
Returns a handle to poll for completion.

showAchievementsOverlay

AGResponseHandle<RequestResponse> showAchievementsOverlay(java.lang.Object... userData)
Show the AmazonGames achievements overlay.

Returns:
Returns a ServiceResponse that contains the ErrorCode if any
